src_text: 热爱学校的学生，是每个校长都该做到的。
tgt_text: Loving students in the school is what every principal should do.

src_text: 热爱学校的学生，总是会为学校的声誉着想。
tgt_text: Students who love school always think about the reputation of the school.

src_text: 连累了小李的家人，让小李十分后悔。
tgt_text: Affecting his family made Xiao Li regretful.

src_text: 连累了小李的家人，对小李十分抱歉。
tgt_text: The family who affected Xiao Li felt very sorry for Xiao Li.

src_text: 牵连了领导的上级，让领导十分抱歉。
tgt_text: Involving the leader's superior made the leader very sorry.

src_text: 牵连了领导的上级，让领导直接供出自己。
tgt_text: The leader's superiors who involved the leader allowed the leader to give himself directly.

src_text: 得罪了大众的明星，就不再是明星了。
tgt_text: The star who offended the public is no longer a star.

src_text: 得罪了大众的明星，会被明星的粉丝攻讦。
tgt_text: Offending the popular star will be attacked by star fans.

src_text: 围剿土匪的部队，随时都可以集结。
tgt_text: The forces to surround the bandits can be assembled at any time.

src_text: 围剿土匪的部队，是件刻不容缓的事情。
tgt_text: Surrounding the bandits' forces is urgent.

src_text: 思念家乡的人们，我无时无刻不想回去。
tgt_text: Miss the people in my hometown and I don't want to go back all the time.

src_text: 思念家乡的人们，会回到家乡过年。
tgt_text: People who miss their hometown will return to their hometown for Chinese New Year.

src_text: 打倒反对派的人士，欢聚在一起庆祝。
tgt_text: People who brought down the opposition gathered together to celebrate.

src_text: 打倒反对派的人士，以及他们的帮凶。
tgt_text: Defeat the opposition and their accomplices.

src_text: 发现敌人的部队，我军立刻展开了攻击。
tgt_text: Upon discovering the enemy's troops, our army immediately launched an attack.

src_text: 发现敌人的部队，是我们的先头部队。
tgt_text: The troop discovering the enemy is our vanguard.

src_text: 观察园林的行人，看上去都十分开心。
tgt_text: The pedestrians observing the garden looked very happy.

src_text: 观察园林的行人，行人的脚步都很匆忙。
tgt_text: Observing the pedestrians in the garden, we can see that the pedestrians are hurried.

src_text: 关心的是她母亲，她母亲亲自熬了粥来照顾她。
tgt_text: Her mother was concerned about her, and her mother boiled porridge to take care of her.

src_text: 关心的是她母亲，她母亲已经七十多了。
tgt_text: She was concerned about her mother, and her mother was already over seventy.

src_text: 关心企业的员工，这样的员工值得表扬。
tgt_text: Employees who concerned about the conmpany were commendable.

src_text: 关心企业的员工，要提升他们的生活住宿待遇。
tgt_text: Concerning about the employees of the company should improve their condition for living and accommodation.

src_text: 他写了两个小时的发言稿，意味着他要发言两个小时。
tgt_text: He wrote a two-hour speech, which meant he would speak for two hours.

src_text: 他写了两个小时的发言稿，还没有把发言稿写完。
tgt_text: He wrote speech for 2 hours and hasn't finished it yet.

src_text: 这次书法比赛有两个协会的大师来当评委，他们各自为协会代言。
tgt_text: In this calligraphy competition, the masters of two associations came to be judges, and they each spoke for the association.

src_text: 这次书法比赛有两个协会的大师来当评委，他们是书法协会的核心人物。
tgt_text: There are two masters of the association to be judges in this calligraphy competition. They are the core figures of the calligraphy association.

src_text: 对他的尊敬，我们都承受不起。
tgt_text: We can't afford his respect.

src_text: 对他的尊敬，源于他的高尚品格。
tgt_text: The respect for him stems from his noble character.

src_text: 对于他的鼓励，我十分感谢。
tgt_text: I am very grateful for his encouragement.

src_text: 对于他的鼓励，深深地激励了他。
tgt_text: The encouragement for him deeply inspired him.

src_text: 关于他的疑惑，我直接解答了他。
tgt_text: Regarding his doubts, I answered him directly.

src_text: 关于他的疑惑，在人们之间蔓延。
tgt_text: The concerns about him spread among people.

src_text: 对于他的恐惧，源于对他的不了解。
tgt_text: The fear towards him stems from the unfamiliarity with him.

src_text: 对于他的恐惧，老师耐心地抚慰了他。
tgt_text: For his fear, the teacher comforted him patiently.

src_text: 两个城市的居民在讨论，哪个城市未来发展更好。
tgt_text: Residents of the two cities are discussing which city will develop better in the future.

src_text: 两个城市的居民在讨论，刚刚上任的王市长。
tgt_text: Two residents of the city are discussing the newly appointed mayor of Wang.

src_text: 三个国家的领导人在开会，讨论各国的能源政策。
tgt_text: Leaders from three countries are meeting to discuss their energy policies.

src_text: 三个国家的领导人在开会，讨论本国今年军费支出。
tgt_text: Three leaders of the country are meeting to discuss military spending this year.

src_text: 参加比赛的是三个体校的学生，他们都想为各自的学校争光。
tgt_text: Participating in the competition are students from three sports schools, all of whom want to win for their respective schools.

src_text: 参加比赛的是三个体校的学生，他们来自同一个班级。
tgt_text: Participating in the competition were three students from the sports school who came from the same class.

src_text: 两个球队的队员在操场练球，为了今年球队的冠军。
tgt_text: Two players from the team practiced on the playground for this year's championship.

src_text: 两个球队的队员在操场练球，他们两个队经常一起对练。
tgt_text: The players of the two teams practice on the playground. The two teams often practice together.

src_text: 放弃美丽的女人，往往都在追求更为重要的精神世界。
tgt_text: Women who give up beauty often pursues a more important spiritual world.

src_text: 放弃美丽的女人，这个男人选择了离开。
tgt_text: Giving up the beautiful woman, the man chose to leave.

src_text: 学校领导对他的批评，专门开了一个研讨会。
tgt_text: For the criticism from him, the school leaders held a special seminar.

src_text: 学校领导对他的批评，他早已预料到了。
tgt_text: For the criticism to him from the school leaders, he had already anticipated.

src_text: 我们三个人一组，可以分为两组。
tgt_text: We can be divided into two three-member groups.

src_text: 我们三个人一组，因为我们正好可以互补。
tgt_text: We three are in one group because we complement each other.

src_text: 楼下开了家青年理发店，专为青年理发。
tgt_text: There is  a new youth barber shop downstairs , which is specially for young people.

src_text: 楼下开了家青年理发店，发型师全都是青年。
tgt_text: There is  a new barber shop that young people opened downstairs , and all hairdressers are young.

src_text: 县里通知15号前去报道，15号去就不行了。
tgt_text: The county authorities informed that one's arrival should be reported before the 15th, but the 15th would not be included.

src_text: 县里通知15号前去报道，只有15号那天才行。
tgt_text: The county authorities  informed  that.one's arrival should be reported on the 15th, and it would be only allowed  on the 15th.

src_text: 我看了十天的报纸，每天一份。
tgt_text: I read the newspaper for ten days, with one newspaper for each day.

src_text: 我看了十天的报纸，一天全看完了。
tgt_text: I read ten days' newspaper and finished reading all of them in one day.

src_text: 学校里来了三个医院的医生，分别是协和医院，市立医院和省属医院。
tgt_text: Doctors from three hospitals came to the school, namely Xiehe Hospital, Municipal Hospital and Provincial Hospital.

src_text: 学校里来了三个医院的医生，都是协和医院的。
tgt_text: Three doctors from the hospital came to school, all of whom came from Xiehe Hospital.

src_text: 他刚来学校，谁都不认识，只和同桌比较熟。
tgt_text: He had just come to school, and he didn't know anyone but his deskmate.

src_text: 他刚来学校，谁都不认识，大家都不和他说话。
tgt_text: He had just arrived at school, and no one knew him and spoke to him.

src_text: 叫车快点，路上人不多，速度快点没事。
tgt_text: Ask the drivers to drive faster. As there are not many people on the road, faster speed is fine.

src_text: 叫车快点，这边车很多，很好叫。
tgt_text: Call the car quickly. There are a lot of cars here and you will find it easyto call one.

src_text: 三个工人的合理建议，是一条很好的建议。
tgt_text: The reasonable suggestion from the three workers is a good suggestion.

src_text: 三个工人的合理建议，被工会一一讨论通过。
tgt_text: Three reasonable suggestions from the workers were discussed and approved by the union one by one.

src_text: 经济损失加上诉讼费4000元，一共8000元。
tgt_text: Economic loss and litigation fees  with each being 4,000 yuan is altogether 8,000 yuan.

src_text: 经济损失加上诉讼费4000元，都由司机承担。
tgt_text: Economic loss and litigation fees of  4,000 yuan,  shall be borne by the driver.

src_text: 把水留给晚上来的人喝，后来的人都渴了。
tgt_text: Leave the water to those who arrive later  because those who come later are thirsty.

src_text: 把水留给晚上来的人喝，到晚上就买不到水了。
tgt_text: Leave the water to those who arrive in the evening because there is no water to buy at night.

src_text: 我认识你那年才三十岁，我还是个孩子。
tgt_text: I knew you when you were thirty, and I was a child then.

src_text: 我认识你那年才三十岁，你还是个孩子。
tgt_text: I knew you when I was thirty, and you were a child then.

src_text: 妈妈看到我很高兴，问我为何如此开心。
tgt_text: Mom saw that I was happy and asked why I was so happy.

src_text: 妈妈看到我很高兴，因为她很久没见到我了。
tgt_text: Mom was happy to see me because she hadn't seen me for a long time.

src_text: 他批评你做的不对，你听他的便是。
tgt_text: He criticizes you for doing wrong, and you should just follow him.

src_text: 他批评你做的不对，你又没做错什么。
tgt_text: It was wrong that he criticized you because you did nothing wrong.
